mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productno, productcateno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(productno), 0) + 1 as productno FROM product), #{productcateno}, #{name}, #{price}, #{content}, #{recom}, #{cnt}, #{replycnt}, sysdate, #{word});
mapper.select: SELECT productno, productcateno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product ORDER BY productno DESC
SELECT productno, productcateno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product WHERE productcateno=#{productcateno} ORDER BY productno DESC

SELECT i.fname, i.fupname, i.thumb p.productno, p.productcateno, p.name, p.price, p.content, p.recom, p.cnt, p.replycnt, p.rdate, p.word FROM product_image i, product p WHERE (i.productno= p.productno) AND p.productno=#{productno} ORDER BY productno DESC
